comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/534.26+ (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0 Safari/534.26+ Epiphany/3.0.3
Build Identifier: 

This is an utterly trivial script; someone could later extend it though to e.g. detect OS X and describe how to install autoconf-2.13 for that platform if desired.

The rationale for this script is that it follows a convention we've established in GNOME that modules include a ./autogen.sh script which does the work needed to build from git.

If SpiderMonkey ever switches to modern autoconf, we can change this script, and things just work.


Reproducible: Always
comments.author: walters@verbum.org
